title: Radiographic features predictive of recurrence and survival after surgical resection of perihilar cholangiocarcinoma

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Julaluck Promsorn, Panjaporn Naknan, Aumkhae Sookprasert, Kosin Wirasorn, Jarin Chindaprasirt, Attapol Titapun, Piyapharom Intarawichian, Mukesh Harisinghani
